news.headline: Amazon.com, Inc. (AMZN) CEO Jassy Says Trump Tariffs Haven’t Slowed Consumer Spending
news.summary: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN)’s CEO Andy Jassy said Wednesday that consumer spending shows no signs of slowing, despite sweeping tariffs imposed by President Trump. Speaking at the company’s annual shareholder meeting, Jassy confirmed demand remains stable and average selling prices have not risen

news.headline: Ackman's hedge fund Pershing Square bets on Amazon, exits Canadian Pacific
news.summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Billionaire investor Bill Ackman told clients on Thursday that his hedge fund bought Amazon shares last month, betting earnings will continue to grow at the online retailer as President Donald Trump's tariffs bite less than consumers initially feared. news.headline: Nike to sell to Amazon.com for first time in six years, The Information says
news.summary: Amazon (AMZN) plans to start selling Nike (NKE) products for the first time since 2019, with supplies coming directly from the company, according to The Information’s Theo Wayt and Sara Germano, citing an Amazon spokesperson. news.headline: Target’s troubles leave analysts most negative since 2018
news.summary: (Bloomberg) -- Wall Street’s enthusiasm for Target Corp. is at its lowest in more than six years, as disappointing earnings from the big-box retailer spur a series of analyst downgrades.
